column2: Plymouth Industrial REIT, Inc. engages in the acquisition, ownership, and management of single and multi-tenant distribution centers, warehouses, and light industrial properties. The company is headquartered in Boston, Massachusetts and currently employs 11 full-time employees. The firm primarily focused on single-tenant industrial properties and multi-tenant industrial properties. The firm also focused on the acquisition, ownership and management of single-and multi-tenant class B industrial properties, including distribution centers, warehouses and light industrial properties, primarily located in secondary and select primary markets across the Eastern half of the United States and Texas. The Companyâ€™s portfolio, which consists of 20 industrial properties located in seven states, is held through Plymouth Industrial 20 LLC. The firm owns and operates in 20 industrial properties located in seven states with an aggregate of approximately four million rentable square feet of rentable space that as of March 31, 2017, the Company Portfolio was 98.4% leased to 37 different tenants across 17 industry types.
